description: Overview* Digital Visual Interface (DVI) is the standard interface for a high-performance connection between PCs and flat panel displays, digital CRT displays, projectors, and HDTVs.* DVI-D Digital Cables from Cables Matters deliver the high-performance, high-bandwidth interface needed for video displays of today while leaving headroom for the products of tomorrow.* Use these high performance dual link digital cables to interface between a PC and display. These cables meet TMDS spec. and are fully compliant with DVI standards.Specifications* Gold plated 24-pin DVI-D Dual-Link connectors resist corrosion* 100% bare copper conductor, no Copper Clad Steel (CCS)* 28 AWG bare copper conductors enhances signal transmission* 9.9 Gbps bandwidth allows for high resolution* Resolutions up to 3840x2160* Tri-shielded with dual Mylar foil and braid shield reduces EMI/RFI interference
title: Cable Matters Gold Plated DVI-D Dual Link Cable with Ferrites 6 Feet - 4K Resolution Ready
